textAfterTable: Gender discrimination in federally subsidized programs prohibited Hint Name Hard money limit raised to $2000. Soft money contributions to national parties banned. Emissions standards established Gradual budget reduction targets set. If targets not met: sequester Sanctions against schools that fail to meet standards. Annual tests imposed on students President can send troops overseas only if he notifies Congress within 48 hours and withdraws within 90 days Limits political activities of civil service employees States don't have to recognize same-sex marriage Hint Name Congressional budget committees created.
